column4: Hi, need help with high CPU usage - X eats like 70%, been reading all the guides and it doesnt go away with .30 kernel and driver from crack pushers, yes Im on intel
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/X/Troubleshooting/HighCPU says The solution in these cases is to make the daemon stop doing the expensive polling and I have no idea what does it mean
my guess is you don't have hardware acceleration and you're running something intensive... that would creat high cpu load
